SEARCH
Package org.eclipse.ui.texteditor

Class InfoForm

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.ui.texteditor.InfoForm
@Deprecated public class InfoForm extends Object
Deprecated.
since 3.0. there is no replacement, use org.eclipse.ui.forms to define a component with a similar look and function.
A form consisting of a title, a banner, and an info text. Banner and info text are separated by a separator line. This form must be handled like an SWT widget.
Since:
2.0
